title: Loan Management System
description: This project was created using tools like Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse, and Business Process Flows by building a loan management app.

title: Wyrmspan Dragon App
description: As a fan of board games, I created a virtual version of the 'Wyrmspan' companion book. This version is fully searchable, interactive, and even features audio descriptions, providing players with an enhanced and immersive experience.

title: Mastermind
description: As a big fan of puzzle games, I developed a virtual version of the classic game 'Mastermind.' Players use logic and deduction to crack the correct color combination, making it a fun and engaging challenge in a digital format.
